trans-unit.source: Represents a secure client session for user activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个用于用户激活、许可证绑定和其他权限管理操作的安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: 与其他<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>类型，<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>只能是在完全信任应用程序中可用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> class
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>类

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.ApplicationManifest" /> specified when the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建 <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.ApplicationManifest" /> 时指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />。

trans-unit.source: The application manifest specified to the <see cref="Overload:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create" /> method when the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="Overload:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create" /> 时为 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 方法指定的应用程序清单。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.ApplicationManifest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.ApplicationManifest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session for rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安全的客户端会话进行权限管理操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建安全的环境。

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序权限清单。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 要为其授予权限管理内容访问权限的用户或用户组。

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session for a specified user with a given rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定权限清单为指定用户创建安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于激活、许可证绑定和其他权限管理操作的安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method is intended for use with users that are already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>方法旨在用于已激活的用户，例如从返回的列表中提供<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use the alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method for users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: 使用备用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>尚未激活的用户的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建安全的环境。

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序权限清单。

trans-unit.source: The method of authentication.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证的方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the user rights account certificate.
trans-unit.target: 用户权限帐户证书的类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session given an application rights manifest, <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" />, and <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建给定了应用程序权限清单 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode" /> 的安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于激活、许可证绑定和其他权限管理操作的安全客户端会话。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method is intended for new users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>方法适用于尚未激活的新用户。

trans-unit.source: Activating a new user includes a roundtrip server transaction to obtain the User Certificate and Client License Certificate.
trans-unit.target: 激活新用户包括往返服务器事务获取用户证书和客户端许可证证书。

trans-unit.source: The alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method can be used if a user is already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 备用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>方法可以使用如果已激活用户，如从返回的列表中提供<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建安全的环境。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: The application should call <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> when finished with the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应调用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>时已完成，但<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> is called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> are reclaimed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>调用时，分配给资源<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>垃圾回收器回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> before the last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> is released.
trans-unit.target: 始终调用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>之前的最后一个引用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>释放。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> is not called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the instance's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>不调用，分配给资源<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>直到垃圾回收器调用的实例不会被释放<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> invokes the protected <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> 调用受保护<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 时已释放的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the activated users.
trans-unit.target: 返回激活用户的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of the currently activated users.
trans-unit.target: 当前激活用户的一个列表。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 要为其授予权限管理内容访问权限的用户或用户组。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a given user has been activated for accessing rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否已激活访问权限管理内容的给定用户。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the given <paramref name="user" /> has been activated for accessing rights managed content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已激活访问权限管理内容的给定 <paramref name="user" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.IsUserActivated%2A> method to determine if given user has been authorized to access rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.IsUserActivated%2A>方法来确定如果给定授权用户访问权限管理的内容。

trans-unit.source: The user to remove the license activation for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其删除许可证激活的用户。

trans-unit.source: Removes the license activation for a specified user.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定用户的许可证激活。

trans-unit.source: The user authentication must be performed either with Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 身份验证或 Passport 身份验证，则必须执行用户身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="user" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="user" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The given <paramref name="user" /> is not authenticated with either Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: 给定的 <paramref name="user" /> 既未经过 Windows 身份验证也未经过 Passport 身份验证的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user or user-group specified when the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 时指定的用户或用户组。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser)" /> method when the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser)" /> 时为 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 方法指定的用户或用户组。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.User%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.User%2A>属性
